description: Hot boy next door, Pierce Hartman steps onto the mat for the first time, going toe to toe with Kaden Alexander. Kaden is riding the high of winning his first victory and doesn't plan on letting Pierce get in the way of that. Pierce may not have formal training, but with his superior size and reach, he plans on tangling up his opponent and giving him another devastating loss. Will the newcomer prove himself on the mat and completely humiliate his opponent? Or will he suffer a rough ground 'n pound before getting showered with a face full of cum?
title: Hot newcomer Pierce Hartman challenges Kaden Alexander
